content:
The Dataverse Project would like to gather use cases and information supporting DDC-CDI standards in  Dataverse: https://ddialliance.org/Specification/ddi-cdi.

If your community is using this standard or is interested in using it, we would like to hear from you as we investigate its usefulness for the Dataverse Community (and any interest for the biomedical community).

Please complete the following poll and use an institution/organization email in all communications: https://doodle.com/meeting/participate/id/dBQBVOxb

Regards
